item.description:
Living in Abundance: The Law of Attraction

Learn the principles and practice of abundance. It's not a secret - it is the way the universe works and you too can create the life that you want to live. Turn your life of lack - not enough money, time, love, joy, peace - into a life of abundance!

YOU REALLY CAN HAVE IT ALL!

Join us for an evening that will change your life forever. Become the co-creator of the life that you are meant to live.
item.name: Living in Abundance: The Law of Attraction
